Source.Name: perl-lwp-mediatypes
Source.Summary: LWP::MediaTypes - guess media type for a file or a URL
Source.Description: This module provides functions for handling media (also known as MIME) types and encodings. The mapping from file extensions to media types is defined by the media.types file. If the ~/.media.types file exists it is used instead. For backwards compatibility we will also look for ~/.mime.types.
